sqlMap.select:
select p.createDate,p.lastUpdate,p.partId,p.partName,p.partNo,fc.customerId ,c.customerCode,f.fgId,f.fgNo,f.fgName,p.remark from m_part p inner join m_fg_part fp on p.partid = fp.partid inner join m_fg_customer fc on fp.fgid = fc.fgid inner join m_fg f on fp.fgId = f.fgId inner join m_customer c on fc.customerid = c.customerid where p.isenable = 1 p.partid = #partId# f.fgId = #fgId# c.customerid = #customerId#
ORDER BY p.partName,p.partNo
sqlMap.sql:
FROM m_part p inner join m_fg_part fp on p.partid = fp.partid inner join m_fg_customer fc on fp.fgid = fc.fgid inner join m_fg f on fp.fgId = f.fgId inner join m_customer c on fc.customerid = c.customerid
c.customerid = #customerId# f.fgNo like #fgNo# + '%' f.fgName like #fgName# + '%' p.partNo like #partNo# + '%' p.partName like #partName# + '%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT fc.customerId ,c.customerCode ,f.fgId ,f.fgNo ,f.fgName ,p.partId ,p.partName ,p.partNo ,p.remark
ORDER BY customerCode, fgNo, partNo

SELECT b.cbom_fg as fgNo ,CASE(x.BUSHO) WHEN 'DIE CAST' THEN SUBSTRING(x.bumo,1,4) ELSE x.bumo END as wip ,x.name as wipName ,CASE(x.BUSHO) WHEN 'DIE CAST' THEN 1 WHEN 'SHOT BLAST' THEN 3 WHEN 'MACHINE' THEN 3 ELSE 2 END AS wipType ,BUSHO as wipGroup ,b.cbom_level as tpicsOrder FROM (SELECT [cbom_fg],[cbom_level],[cbom_usedqty],[cbom_item],[cbom_oyak] ,[cbom_process], CASE [cbom_process] WHEN 'DIE CAST' THEN SUBSTRING([cbom_wc],1,4) ELSE [cbom_wc] END AS cbom_wc FROM tpics_cbom b WHERE b.cbom_process not in ('Purchase','Nominate')) b INNER JOIN tpics_xsect x ON x.bumo = b.cbom_wc WHERE 1=1
#partList[].fgNo#
ORDER BY b.cbom_level DESC

statement.isNotEmpty: MERGE INTO m_part p USING (SELECT MAX(a.partId) as partId from (SELECT partId FROM m_part WHERE partNo = #partNo# UNION ALL SELECT -1) a) op ON (p.partId = op.partId) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p.partNo = #partNo#, p.partName = #partName#, p.updateBy = #updateBy#, p.lastUpdate = GETDATE() WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(partNo,partName,createBy,updateBy) VALUES(#partNo#,#partName#,#createBy#,#updateBy#) OUTPUT INSERTED.partId, op.partId;

sqlMap.update: UPDATE m_part SET remark = #remark#, updateBy = #updateBy#, lastUpdate = GETDATE() WHERE partId = #partId# AND lastUpdate = #lastUpdate#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT p.partid,p.partno,p.partname,p.remark FROM m_part p
p.partid = #value#

SELECT TOP 50 partid AS partId ,partno AS partNo ,partname AS partName FROM v_cust_fg_part
customerid = #customerId# partno like #partNo# + '%' partname like #partName# + '%'
GROUP By partId, partNo, partName ORDER BY partNo

SELECT TOP 50 p.partid AS partId ,p.partno AS partNo ,p.partname AS partName ,pw.wip AS wip FROM m_part p INNER JOIN m_part_wip pw ON p.partid = pw.partid
pw.wip = #wip# p.partno like #partNo# + '%' p.partname like #partName# + '%'
GROUP BY p.partId,p.partNo, p.partName, pw.wip ORDER BY partNo

SELECT TOP 50 CUST_PART.partid AS partId ,CUST_PART.partno AS partNo ,CUST_PART.partname AS partName ,CUST_PART.customerid AS customerId ,pw.wip AS wip FROM ( SELECT customerid AS customerId ,partid AS partId ,partno AS partNo ,partname AS partName FROM v_cust_fg_part GROUP BY customerId, partId, partNo, partName ) AS CUST_PART INNER JOIN m_part_wip pw ON CUST_PART.partid = pw.partid
CUST_PART.customerid = #customerId# pw.wip = #wip# CUST_PART.partno like #partNo# + '%' CUST_PART.partname like #partName# + '%'
ORDER BY partNo

SELECT partid AS partId FROM v_cust_fg_part
customerid = #customerId# partno = #partNo# partname = #partName#
GROUP By partId, partNo, partName ORDER BY partNo

SELECT p.partid AS partId ,p.partno AS partNo ,p.partname AS partName ,pw.wip AS wip FROM m_part p INNER JOIN m_part_wip pw ON p.partid = pw.partid
pw.wip = #wip# p.partno = #partNo# p.partname = #partName#
GROUP BY p.partId,p.partNo, p.partName, pw.wip ORDER BY partNo

SELECT CUST_PART.partid AS partId ,CUST_PART.partno AS partNo ,CUST_PART.partname AS partName ,CUST_PART.customerid AS customerId ,pw.wip AS wip FROM ( SELECT customerid AS customerId ,partid AS partId ,partno AS partNo ,partname AS partName FROM v_cust_fg_part GROUP BY customerId, partId, partNo, partName ) AS CUST_PART INNER JOIN m_part_wip pw ON CUST_PART.partid = pw.partid
CUST_PART.customerid = #customerId# pw.wip = #wip# CUST_PART.partno = #partNo# CUST_PART.partname = #partName#
ORDER BY partNo

SELECT PART.PARTID AS partId, PART.PARTNO AS partNo, PART.PARTNAME AS partName, PART.REMARK AS remark, PART.SNP_WIP AS lot, PART.MATERIALID AS materialId, MAT.SMATERIALCODE + ' : ' + MAT.SMATERIALNAME AS materialName, PART.ISENABLE AS choose, PART.CREATEDATE AS createDate, PART.CREATEBY AS createdBy, PART.LASTUPDATE AS lastUpdate, PART.UPDATEBY AS updatedBy FROM M_PART PART LEFT JOIN M_MATERIAL MAT ON MAT.NMATERIALID = PART.MATERIALID ORDER BY PART.PARTNO

SELECT part.partId AS partId, part.partNo AS partNo, part.partName AS partName, part.remark AS remark, part.materialId AS materialId, mat.sMaterialCode + ' : ' + mat.sMaterialName as material, part.createDate AS createDate, part.createBy AS createdBy, part.lastUpdate AS lastUpdate, part.updateBy AS updatedBy, part.isEnable AS choose, part.snp_wip AS lot FROM m_part part LEFT JOIN m_material mat ON part.materialid = mat.nmaterialid
part.partId LIKE '%' + #partId# + '%'
part.partNo LIKE '%' + #partNo# + '%'
part.partName LIKE '%' + #partName# + '%'
part.snp_wip LIKE '%' + #lot# + '%'
mat.sMaterialCode + ' : ' + mat.sMaterialName LIKE '%' + #materialName# + '%'
part.isEnable = #choose#
part.createBy LIKE '%' + #createdBy# + '%'
CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), part.createDate, 103) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), part.createDate, 108) LIKE '%' + #createDate# + '%'
part.updateBy LIKE '%' + #updatedBy# + '%'
CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), part.lastUpdate, 103) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), part.lastUpdate, 108) LIKE '%' + #lastUpdate# + '%'
ORDER BY part.partNo

insert.iterate: INSERT INTO M_PART (partNo, partName, snp_wip, materialId, isEnable,createDate, createBy, lastUpdate, updateBy) VALUES (#partList[].partNo#, #partList[].partName#, #partList[].lot#,#partList[].materialId#, #partList[].choose#, SYSDATETIME(), #createBy#, SYSDATETIME(), #updateBy#)

iterate.isNotNull: UPDATE M_PART SET partNo = #partList[].partNo#, partName = #partList[].partName#, remark = #partList[].remark#, snp_wip = #partList[].lot#, materialId = #partList[].materialId#, isEnable = #partList[].choose#, lastUpdate = GETDATE(), updateBy = #updateBy# WHERE partId = #partList[].partId#;
